summary.span: 为 Web 部件的个性化设置实现管理功能。

span.span: Implements management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供多个静态方法和属性，这些方法和属性公开 Web 部件个性化设置的管理和管理功能。This class provides several static methods and properties that expose management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization. 这些方法适用于在 控件中为 Web 部件控件配置的默认个性化设置提供程序。These methods apply to the default personalization provider configured in the control for a Web Parts control. 如果需要管理多个充当个性化设置提供程序的数据存储区，则应直接在单独的个性化设置提供程序类上使用这些方法。If you need to administer several data stores that are acting as personalization providers, you should use the methods on the individual personalization provider classes directly. 请注意，为控件配置的个性化设置提供程序的集合 可以从 静态属性中获取。Note that the collection of configured personalization providers for a control is available from the static property. 需要注意的是，如果您的 Web 应用程序不是以默认信任级别或更高级别运行，个性化设置将失败 (您可以使用元素) 在 Web.config 文件中设置自定义信任级别 `` 。It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `` element). 和 类都在初始化时检查的信任级别 。The and classes both check for a trust level of when they are initialized. 如果将应用程序配置为在信任级别运行 ，并使用默认 提供程序来管理应用程序的个性化设置数据，则该应用程序首次尝试访问个性化设置数据时将失败，因为在信任中运行的 ASP.NET 工作进程 不具有调用命名空间中的各个类所必需的权限 。If you configure your application to run at a trust level of , and you use the default provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在类中使用几个方法 。The following code example demonstrates how to use several methods in the class. 此示例包含一个 .aspx 页面，该页面引用名为 Web 部件用户控件 `Persadmin.ascx` 。This example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Parts user control named `Persadmin.ascx`. 下面的代码为示例提供 .aspx 文件。The following code provides the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/defaultcs.aspx#7)] 此代码提供 `Persadmin.ascx` 控件。This code provides the `Persadmin.ascx` control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/PersAdmin.ascx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置提供程序指定的应用程序名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application specified by the provider.
The application name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序名称会影响个性化设置提供程序检索和保存的数据，并允许多个应用程序通过设置相同的应用程序名称来共享数据，或通过指定不同的应用程序名称来对同一数据库中的数据进行分区。The application name affects the data retrieved and saved by the personalization provider, and allows for multiple applications to either share data by setting an identical application name, or partition data within the same database by specifying different application names. 应用程序名称位于 Web.config 或 System.config 文件的 "个性化设置提供程序" 部分中。The application name is found in the personalization provider section of the Web.config or System.config file. > [!CAUTION] > 由于单个默认配置文件提供程序实例用于某个对象提供的所有请求 ，因此您可以同时执行多个请求并尝试设置该 属性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 对于多个写入，属性不是线程安全的，并且更改 属性值可能会导致应用程序的多个用户产生意外行为。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 除非需要，否则建议你避免使用代码来允许用户设置 属性。It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the property unless required. 可能需要设置属性的应用程序的一个示例 是管理多个应用程序的配置文件数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property might be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序，而不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

summary.span: 基于指定参数为非活动用户返回每名用户个性化状态信息的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回 实例、每用户个性化状态信息的集合，其中 `pathToMatch` 参数值与页面的路径匹配， `usernameToMatch` 与具有与该页面关联的个性化设置数据的用户名匹配，用户被视为不活动状态。This method returns a collection of instances, per-user personalization state information where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page, and the users are considered inactive. 换言之，对于每个返回的记录，用户的 属性值小于或等于 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。In other words, for each returned record the user's property value is less than or equal to `userInactiveSinceDate`. 返回的集合只包含 实例。The returned collection contains only instances. 此方法将查询通配符传递到基础数据存储区。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 对通配符的支持当前依赖于每个访问接口如何处理星号 ( \* ) 、百分比符号 (% ) 或下划线 (_) 。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常，对于符合 SQL 标准的数据存储区，可以在部分路径上执行通配符搜索，通配符字符显示在属性中搜索字符串文本的开头、末尾或中间 。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以 "/vdir" 开头的所有路径 \~ ，则该 属性将设置为 " \~ /vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". 同样，在部分用户名上进行通配符搜索可能会在该属性的文本字符串中的任意位置显示通配符 。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找所有以 "John" 开头的用户名，该 属性将类似于 "john%"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序 时，派生对象将按字母顺序返回，并按路径和用户名的组合进行升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 对象在集合中的顺序由提供程序确定。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 如果 `userInactiveSinceDate` 为 ，则此方法返回的值等效于 。If `userInactiveSinceDate` is , then the returned values from this method are equivalent to . `pathToMatch`和都 `usernameToMatch` 可以是 `null` 。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`参数可以包括逗号 (，) 因为某些数据存储（如那些运行 Microsoft SQL Server 的数据存储区）允许逗号作为通配符。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can include commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

`pageIndex` `pageSize` ，其中 `pageIndex` 控制要返回的记录数并 `pageSize` 控制要返回的记录数。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` the first 25 entries. 如果 `pageIndex` 设置为1，并且 `pageSize` 设置为25，则返回的数据将为第26到50的条目。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回实例的集合， 其中 `pathToMatch` 值与具有共享个性化设置状态数据的页面的路径匹配。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` value matches the path of a page that has shared personalization state data. 集合只包含 实例。The collection contains only instances. 此方法将参数通配符传递到基础个性化设置提供程序，因此数据存储区如何处理这些字符取决于提供程序如何处理星号 ( \* ) 、百分比符号 (% ) 或下划线 (_) 。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常，对于符合 SQL 标准的数据存储区，可以在部分路径上执行通配符搜索，通配符字符显示在属性中搜索字符串文本的开头、末尾或中间 。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以 "/vdir" 开头的所有路径 \~ ，则该 属性将设置为 " \~ /vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序 时，派生对象将按字母顺序返回，并按路径和用户名的组合进行升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 对象在集合中的顺序由提供程序确定。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`参数可以是 `null` 。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为 `null` ，则在执行查询时将忽略参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. 返回的数据受和约束 `pageIndex` `pageSize` ，其中 `pageIndex` 控制要返回的记录数并 `pageSize` 控制要返回的记录数。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果 `pageIndex` 设置为0，并且 `pageSize` 设置为25，则返回的数据将是前25个条目。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果 `pageIndex` 设置为1，并且 `pageSize` 设置为25，则返回的数据将为第26到50的条目。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`参数返回可用记录的总数。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回实例的集合 `pathToMatch` ，其中参数值与页面的路径匹配，并 `usernameToMatch` 与包含与该页面关联的个性化设置数据的用户名匹配。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, and `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page. 集合只包含 实例。The collection contains only instances. 此方法将参数通配符传递到基础个性化设置提供程序，因此数据存储区如何处理这些字符取决于提供程序如何处理星号 ( \* ) 、百分比符号 (% ) 或下划线 (_) 。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常，对于符合 SQL 标准的数据存储区，可以在部分路径上执行通配符搜索，通配符字符显示在属性中搜索字符串文本的开头、末尾或中间 。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以 "/vdir" 开头的所有路径 \~ ，则该 属性将设置为 " \~ /vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". 同样，在部分用户名上进行通配符搜索可能会在该属性的文本字符串中的任意位置显示通配符 。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找所有以 "John" 开头的用户名，该 属性将类似于 "john%"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序 时，派生对象将按字母顺序返回，并按路径和用户名的组合进行升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中对象的顺序由提供程序确定。The ordering of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`和都 `usernameToMatch` 可以是 `null` 。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`参数可以有逗号 (，) 因为某些数据存储（如那些运行 Microsoft SQL Server 的数据存储区）允许逗号作为通配符。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 可在类概述主题中找到完整的示例 。The complete example can be found in the class overview topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的集合只包含 实例。The returned collection contains only instances. 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序 时，派生对象将按字母顺序返回，并按路径和用户名的组合进行升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 对象在集合中的顺序由提供程序确定。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 此方法返回用户的 属性值小于或等于 属性值的项。This method returns items where the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 如果 为 ，则此方法会有效地返回基础数据存储区中的所有每用户数据。If is , this method effectively returns all per-user data in the underlying data store. 返回值受和参数的约束 `pageIndex` `pageSize` ，其中 `pageIndex` 控制要返回的记录 `pageSize` 数并控制要返回的记录数。The return values are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果 `pageIndex` 设置为0，并且 `pageSize` 设置为25，则返回的数据将是前25个条目。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果 `pageIndex` 设置为1，并且 `pageSize` 设置为25，则返回的数据将为第26到50的条目。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`参数返回可用记录的总数。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与指定参数匹配的记录 `pathtoMatch` ，并且用户的 属性值小于或等于 属性值。This method returns records where the page matches the specified `pathtoMatch` parameter and the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 如果 设置为 ，则返回所有用户的个性化设置信息的计数。If is set to , a count of all users' personalization information is returned. 请注意， `pathToMatch` 参数可以包含通配符。Note that the `pathToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 方法将通配符传递到基础数据存储区。The method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 通配符支持当前依赖于每个访问接口如何处理星号 ( \* ) 、百分比符号 (% ) 或下划线 (_) 。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常，对于符合 SQL 标准的数据存储区，可以在部分路径上执行通配符搜索，通配符字符显示在属性中搜索字符串文本的开头、末尾或中间 。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以 "/vdir" 开头的所有路径 \~ ，则该 属性将设置为 " \~ /vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "\~/vdir", the property would be set to "\~/vdir%". `pathToMatch`参数可以是 `null` 。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为 `null` ，则在执行查询时将忽略参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回基础数据存储区中给定的每用户个性化设置项的计数 `usernameToMatch` 。This method returns a count of the number of per-user personalization items in the underlying data store that exist for the given `usernameToMatch`. 请注意， `usernameToMatch` 参数可以包含通配符。Note that the `usernameToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 此方法将通配符传递到基础数据存储区。This method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 通配符支持当前依赖于每个访问接口如何处理星号 ( \* ) 、百分比符号 (% ) 或下划线 (_) 。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常，对于与 SQL 兼容的数据存储区，对部分用户名的通配符搜索可以在该属性的文本字符串中的任意位置显示通配符 。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, a wildcard search on a partial user name can have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找所有以 "John" 开头的用户名，该 参数将类似于 "john%"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". `usernameToMatch`参数可以是 `null` 。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为 `null` ，则在执行查询时将忽略参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. 此 `usernameToMatch` 参数允许使用逗号 (，) 因为某些数据存储（如那些运行 Microsoft SQL Server 的数据存储区）允许逗号作为通配符。The `usernameToMatch` parameter is allowed to have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回个性化设置提供程序的集合。This property returns a collection of personalization providers. 集合在应用程序初始化时填充，并包含对按名称索引的提供程序对象的引用。The collection is populated at the initialization of the application and contains references to provider objects indexed by name. 默认提供程序按 Web.config 或 Machine.config 配置文件中指定的名称编制索引。The default provider is indexed by the name specified in the Web.config or Machine.config configuration file. 请注意，返回的集合是只读的;对 `Remove` 、或的调用 `Add` `Clear` 将导致引发异常。Note that the returned collection is read-only; calls to `Remove`, `Add`, or `Clear` will result in an exception being thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重置基础数据存储区中与指定路径关联的所有每用户状态，其中用户的 属性值小于或等于 属性值。This method resets all per-user state in the underlying data store associated with the specified path, where the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 对于需要多行数据来存储页的个性化设置状态的数据存储区，或者对于用户和页面组合，重置行的计数可能与个性化设置状态的计数不同。For data stores that require more than one row of data to store personalization state for a page, or for a user and page combination, the count of reset rows might differ from the count of personalization state. 如果基础提供程序公开了事务感知数据存储中的数据，则此方法将在单个事务中执行其操作。If the underlying provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method performs its operations in a single transaction. 尝试重置不存在的共享状态并不是错误。It is not an error to attempt to reset nonexistent shared state. 如果 为 ，则此方法会有效地为指定的路径重置基础数据存储区中的所有每用户数据。If is , this method effectively resets all per-user data in the underlying data store for the specified path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法根据集合中包含的对象重置基础数据存储区中的个性化设置数据 。This method resets personalization data in the underlying data store, based on the objects contained in the collection. 您可以使用此方法根据集合的内容有选择地删除共享和每用户数据的混合。You can use this method to selectively delete a mixture of shared and per-user data based on the collection's contents. 对象指示将重置页面的共享数据; 对象指示将重置特定页面的每用户数据。 objects indicate that shared data for a page will be reset; objects indicate that per-user data for a specific page will be reset. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不保证在单个事务中发生所有重置，因为该集合指向随机的个性化设置数据集。This method does not guarantee that all resets occur within a single transaction because the collection points to random sets of personalization data. 如果集合中包含的对象引用不存在的数据，则不是错误。It is not an error for the collection to contain objects that reference nonexistent data.

span.span: The number of rows that were reset.

span.span: Resets all per-user state in the underlying data store for the specified paths.

returns.span: 已重置的行数。

span.span: The number of rows that were reset.
